body_html: Hi, I have used array_ops.transpose(array_ops.gather(array_ops.transpose(indices), perm)) instead of array_ops.concat(1, [indices[:, 1:2], indices[:, 0:1]]) according to your suggestion. I have run the tests locally and are passing. I have added a simple test, so please do have a look at it and let me know if there are any better tests. Thanks!
body_text: Hi, I have used array_ops.transpose(array_ops.gather(array_ops.transpose(indices), perm)) instead of array_ops.concat(1, [indices[:, 1:2], indices[:, 0:1]]) according to your suggestion. body: Hi, I have used `array_ops.transpose(array_ops.gather(array_ops.transpose(indices), perm))` instead of `array_ops.concat(1, [indices[:, 1:2], indices[:, 0:1]])` according to your suggestion. I have run the tests locally and are passing. I have added a simple test, so please do have a look at it and let me know if there are any better tests. Thanks!
